dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5558 IH: Improving Child Care for Working Families Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Schrier (for herself, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Ms. Norton, and Mr. Thanedar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation of the exclusion for dependent care assistance programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Improving Child Care for Working Families Act of 2025.

section.header: Increase in limitation of exclusion for dependent care assistance programs

subsection.text: Section 129(a)(2)(A) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking $7,500 ($3,750 and inserting $10,500 (half such dollar amount.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to amounts paid or incurred in calendar years beginning after the date of the enactment of this Act.
